atham wita me aakalpaya aththe gihi pakshaya athara pamanak nowana bawakda peni yayi.piriwen adhyamapanaya thulin bihiwa wishwawidya la kshethrayaye usas adhyaapana waram laba paminena atham bhikshun wahansela thula pawa mebandu aakalpa athibawa peni yayi.aarambhaka kala wakawanuwa thula hudek jiwana darshanayak se krilayawata nangemin awabodha kara ganimin pawathi bududahama kalaye awamen, ada wanawita sampraradayika aagamika lakshanaurumakara gath thawath ek aagamak bawata pathwa athi bawa sihipathkalayuthuwanuye dharmasanwegayeni.thispaswani wiyedi buddhathwayata pathwu siddhartha thawusano ethek samajaye kisiweku anugamanaya nokala wenasma krayamawedayak lowata handunwa dimata samath wuha.

1965 agosthu masa 13 wani dina indiyawe di upatha labana shri dewige nama wuye shari amman yangar ayiyappanya.age piya nithignyayeku wu athara shri lankawe da ohu nithignyayeku lesa katayuthu kara thibe.age mawa rajeshwari wuathara ek soyuriyak saha sahodarayayin dedenek ayata sitiyi.1985 di mithun chakraborthi samaga wiwaha wena shri dewi 1988 di ohugen wen wanneya.pasuwa 1996 di boni kapur samaga wiwahawana ayata yanchi saha kushi nam diyaniyan dedenak sitiyi.

puththalama, halawatha, madampe, marawila, wennappuwa yana surabadu karyala wala niladharin gathawu masa haya thula mema watalim sidu kota atha.mehidi balapathra nomathiwa dumkola nishpadanaya kala sakakaruwan 23 deneku kotu kara ganimata surabadu niladharin samathwi atha.puththalama disthrikkaye balapathra sthanawala sidu kala waradi waladi mathpan litar dahanamalaksha thishatharadas ekasiya pahak athadanguwata gena athayida somawira mahatha pawasiya.wayambaa sahakara surabadu komasaris kapila kumarasinha mahathage upades matha, halawatha surabadu adhikari ke. ech. yu. somawira mahatha puththalama, halawatha, madampe, marawila, wennappuwa yana sthanawala surabadu sthanadhipathiwarun ha niladharin mema watalim sidu kalaha..
